# twitterbots

An `R` package for identifying automatically generated Twitter data based on
text similarity, spatial and temporal features.

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/karpfen/twitterbots.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/karpfen/twitterbots) 
[![Project Status: Concept - Minimal or no implementation has been done yet.](http://www.repostatus.org/badges/0.1.0/concept.svg)](http://www.repostatus.org/#concept)

### Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("karpfen/twitterbots")
```
